hiveArticle.title: Do you want to show the world that you are Rich ?
hiveArticle.body:
I was surfing through Google Play Store in the paid apps section and guess what I have found a lot of app which will make you feel rich.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRMXGHZpQxR7wdJp5RpruzK6brRVfYrV5twNJgNWS2gxS/image.png)
The price was highlighted to show the cost of each app.

Now read the description of the first one, it says with this app you can show the world that you are rich :P

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmR12hDqQugj8Wfhq1MgfTmQohGTZ5pDajeeSHRQ1khUuH/image.png)

And the funny reviews follows. One such review is "This app changed my life. One morning, I woke up being poor. So I saved all of my money to buy this app. It's incredible, and shows that I have money even when I actually don't. I don't know what I would do without it." I mean seriously.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfZF7wnGfjk3ZTZQ86g5NWuorTWifJZBTB8j42FbeLA3G/image.png)

### What's the purpose of this applications?
###

Well to prove to the world that you are RICH.

I mean wow. I was speechless. I immediately left the Play Store.s
